item.title: How to support WAHA using Crypto
item.description:
We have special ⚡50% OFF Yearly Crypto Offer!⚡ for you!

In this article, we’re going to cover different techniques for those who not familiar with crypto payments how you can still support the project and get WAHA Plus and WAHA PRO.

item.title: ⚡50% OFF Yearly Crypto Offer!⚡
item.description:
⚡50% OFF Yearly Offer!⚡

  • Plus - $228 $110
  • PRO - $1,188 $590

Save the fees and get Plus or PRO for a year donating in crypto!
